channel.title: !read! omfg tons of client developements !read!
channel.description:
[center][b][size=18pt]Well... Nobody In MoparScape really knows me that well, but I will decide to show you what I know how to do and my goals and achievements in my private server corriculum.[/size][/b][/center]
[center][b]Red: Not Started[/b] [b]Green: Complete[/b] [b]Yellow: 50% or More Done[/b] [b]Orange: 50% or Less Done[/b]
[b]My Projects:[/b]
[b]Expected Realease:[/b] Bloody4Scape Client v1 - Realeased (public: 12-16-08) Bloody4Scape Client v2 - Realeased (public: 12-18-08) Bloody4Scape Client v3 - Realeased (public: 12-19-08) Bloody4Scape X-Mas Client v1 - Realeased (public: 12-20-08) Bloody4Scape X-Mas Client v2 - Server Realeased (public: 12-25-08) Bloody4Scape New Years Client - Project Demo Server Realeased (public: 01-04-09)
--[b]Bloody4Scape Client v1[/b]-- Main Starter Silabsoft Graphics [317] Recolored Items Added Working Shops (perfected) Added PKBox Added Wildy Levels (perfected) Added 317 Skillcape Emotes
--[b]Bloody4Scape Client v2[/b]-- New Text, Auto-White Added Item and NPC Lists in GUI Added New Graphics [382] New Mod Crowns Added Ancients Added Music Fixed Client Backround Added GUI New Sprites Added Client Theme New Dragon Backround Fixed Log In Box
--[b]Bloody4Scape Client v3[/b]-- Added Many More Customs (not recolored) Fixed Sprites Added Object List in GUI Fixed Some Glitchy NPC's Fixed Special Attacks Fixed Ancients (perfected) Fixed GUI Fixed Backround Added Special Client Effects New Log In Box Added Godwars NPC's Added Special Unseen Graphics [430]
--[b]Bloody4Scape X-Mas Client v1[/b]-- Fixed 430 Graphics Setting Fixed Lighting Settings Added Multi to Ancients Added All Godsword Specials Added All Item Specials Client Commands Fixed New Santa Hat Mod + Admin Crowns New Client Backround (fixed and perfected) New Music Added New Items to Client GUI Item Lists Recolored and Added More Items
[b]--Bloody4Scape Bloody4Scape Client Version 4--[/b] Fixed Santa Hat Mod + Admin Crowns (Perfected) Add Client Items to "Item ID List" New GUI (red + white) New Theme (red + white) Fixed Sprites (Perfected) New Godwars NPC's (no glitching) Anti SYI New Music
--[b]Bloody4Scape Client Version 5[/b]-- Fixed Special Attacks (perfected) Fixed Godswords (perfected) New Music New Sprites New Graphics [438] Max Level 138 NPC Talking Interfaces Godsword Specials (perfected) Added Ancients Auto-Cast Added Lunars Tutorial Island Godwars MiniGame (perfected) Added New Items in RuneScape (perfected) Fixed Custom Items (perfected)[/center]
[center][b][size=16pt]This is what Im Working On
Reply and Tell me What You think I should add to these, and Ideas for projects in the future :)
Peace, -Bloody4 FTW[/size][/b][/center]

item.title: !read! omfg tons of client developements !read!
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

[quote=“Bloody4 Ftw, post:5, topic:251695”]Urrm.
Ur wrong yet again…

Ever hear of between 317 and 474??
My NPC’s and objects are set as 474
Meanwhile borders, wrappings and other things are set as 317.
Also no… I did not just change sprites. U KIDDING??

These are the things I did that differed all of them:
added gui
added silab items
added new graphics
added new wallpaper
added new music
added new sprites
added new animations
added new npcs
added new items
added new layout
(some of them I left out lolz)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2008, 11:51:52 pm[/size][hr]anyways dont know how someone whos prob been here months is loosing a fight against someone whos been here 2 days.

U shouldn’t flame peepols work anyways its not nice <¤>¿<¤>

                                                                   _______
                                                                      ```
                                                                      [/quote]post picture :D
                                                                      ```

item.title: !read! omfg tons of client developements !read!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Well… Nobody In MoparScape really knows me that well, but I will decide to show you what I know how to do and my goals and achievements in my private server corriculum.[/size][/center]

[center]Red: Not Started
Green: Complete
Yellow: 50% or More Done
Orange: 50% or Less Done

My Projects:

Expected Realease:
Bloody4Scape Client v1 - Realeased (public: 12-16-08)
Bloody4Scape Client v2 - Realeased (public: 12-18-08)
Bloody4Scape Client v3 - Realeased (public: 12-19-08)
Bloody4Scape X-Mas Client v1 - Realeased (public: 12-20-08)
Bloody4Scape X-Mas Client v2 - Server Realeased (public: 12-25-08)
Bloody4Scape New Years Client - Project Demo Server Realeased (public: 01-04-09)

–Bloody4Scape Client v1–
Main Starter
Silabsoft Graphics [317]
Recolored Items
Added Working Shops (perfected)
Added PKBox
Added Wildy Levels (perfected)
Added 317 Skillcape Emotes

–Bloody4Scape Client v2–
New Text, Auto-White
Added Item and NPC Lists in GUI
Added New Graphics [382]
New Mod Crowns
Added Ancients
Added Music
Fixed Client Backround
Added GUI
New Sprites
Added Client Theme
New Dragon Backround
Fixed Log In Box

–Bloody4Scape Client v3–
Added Many More Customs (not recolored)
Fixed Sprites
Added Object List in GUI
Fixed Some Glitchy NPC’s
Fixed Special Attacks
Fixed Ancients (perfected)
Fixed GUI
Fixed Backround
Added Special Client Effects
New Log In Box
Added Godwars NPC’s
Added Special Unseen Graphics [430]

–Bloody4Scape X-Mas Client v1–
Fixed 430 Graphics Setting
Fixed Lighting Settings
Added Multi to Ancients
Added All Godsword Specials
Added All Item Specials
Client Commands Fixed
New Santa Hat Mod + Admin Crowns
New Client Backround (fixed and perfected)
New Music
Added New Items to Client GUI Item Lists
Recolored and Added More Items

–Bloody4Scape Bloody4Scape Client Version 4–
Fixed Santa Hat Mod + Admin Crowns (Perfected)
Add Client Items to “Item ID List”
New GUI (red + white)
New Theme (red + white)
Fixed Sprites (Perfected)
New Godwars NPC’s (no glitching)
Anti SYI
New Music

–Bloody4Scape Client Version 5–
Fixed Special Attacks (perfected)
Fixed Godswords (perfected)
New Music
New Sprites
New Graphics [438]
Max Level 138
NPC Talking Interfaces
Godsword Specials (perfected)
Added Ancients Auto-Cast
Added Lunars
Tutorial Island
Godwars MiniGame (perfected)
Added New Items in RuneScape (perfected)
Fixed Custom Items (perfected)[/center]

[center][b][size=16pt]This is what Im Working On

Reply and Tell me What You think I should add to these, and Ideas for projects in the future

Peace,
-Bloody4 FTW[/size][/b][/center]
